meta.description: A corn farmer sends corn to the city using tractors and cars. Minimize the total number of vehicles needed while meeting corn transport requirements.

sets.name: VEHICLES
sets.description: Types of vehicles used for transporting corn.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each vehicle type in kg.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of vehicle used.

objective.name: min_total_vehicles
objective.description: Minimize the total number of vehicles used.

constraints.name: corn_requirement
constraints.description: At least 500 kg of corn must be sent to the city.

constraints.name: car_tractor_ratio
constraints.description: The number of cars used must be at least twice the number of tractors used.
